attributes.action: STOP SENDING PEOPLE TO PRISON FOR DEBT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People should not be sent to prison for debt if the money can be obtained by seizing their assets or if the debt can be shown to be cicumstances beyond their control and the goverment should change to law so as to reflect this and stop the stupid situation where pensioners go to prison for non-payment of council tax
